channel.title: Port forwarding doens't work! Hamachi needed?
channel.description:
[font=Comic Sans MS]What i do: I start the NO-IP program to update my NO-IP adres, I run the server from my game, tell my friends its ready and they try to login. But there comes "Error connecting to server".
I allready have forwarded my ports, but that doesn't work! =S :( Do i need to use Hamachi? If so, can someone post a link to a topic where is in how to use it?
Or is there another way? Becaus i don't really like Hamachi...
[glow=red,2,300]Thanks, By Mod Mopar[/glow][/font]

i have the same problem but no idea on how to forward my ports so gl and hopefully i get mine working

item.description:
@Mod_Mopar wrote:

  1. But is it true that Hamchi lags the server much?

  2. Well, can you post a link how to use hamachi?[br][size=1]Posted at: 15 August 2006, 04:17:47[/size][hr]I have Hamachi installed and maked my own Network, but how do i set my game on it?

item.source: Port forwarding doens't work! Hamachi needed?

item.title: Port forwarding doens't work! Hamachi needed?
item.dc:creator: @pur3_d3ath pur3 d3ath
item.description:
@pur3_d3ath wrote:

Are you behind a router?
If so, you probabley need Hamachi, Hamachi isn’t bad, Hamachi is a great program, it hides your personal IP address, and sends packets quicker, resulting in a faster server…

I recommend you use Hamachi…

Read full topic
